headline: The Bull Case For Principal Financial Group (PFG) Could Change Following Prolonged Weakness in Core Operations
summary: Recently, Principal Financial Group has faced continued pressure in its core business segments, with commentary highlighting declining sales and increased policy losses over the past five years. This trend underscores persistent end-market headwinds that are weighing on the company's fundamental operations and shaping investor sentiment. We'll explore how ongoing weakness in Principal Financial Group's core business performance may influence its long-term investment narrative. We've found 18...
